tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ConsentForms (
	form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	participant_id INT,
	consent_text TEXT,
	date_signed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
  form_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  consent_date DATE,
  consent_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
    form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    consent_text TEXT,
    consent_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    contact_info VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE research_ethics (
    ethics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    project_title VARCHAR(100),
    approval_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    consent_form_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (consent_form_id) REFERENCES consent_forms(id)
);

CREATE TABLE approvals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    consent_form_id INT,
    approval_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consent_form_id) REFERENCES consent_forms(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_ethics_approvals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    research_title VARCHAR(255),
    approval_date DATE,
    ethics_approval_no VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE consent_forms (
    consent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    consent_given BOOLEAN,
    consent_date DATE,
    signed_by VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    participant_age INT,
    participant_gender CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_title VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_leader_id INT,
    team_member_count INT,
    project_id INT
)
